text: Lubango is the capital city of Huíla in Angola. Until 1975, the city's name was Sá da Bandeira. During the Angolan Civil War (1975–2002), Lubango was a major base of Cuban, SWAPO. Lubango's economy is based on agriculture. ==Notable people== * Marco Abreu, of the Angola national football team was born in Lubango in 1974. Category:Cities in Angola
title: Lubango
